name: Agasti Technologies Private Limited
description:
Agasti TechnologiesÂ is a one stop solution for technology/IT startups and entrepreneurs who have great ideas and want to turn them into a product. Agasti Tech was founded in May 2015. We are helping start-ups right from the prototyping of the idea to the launching of the product and digital marketing of the product.
Agasti Technologies has a dedicated team of extremely talented, customer-focused and diligent individuals who have a diversified skill set. The teams at Agasti Technologies abide by stringent quality standards and tailor their processes to provide state-of-the-art services to their customers. Our transparent, efficient and flexible processes help us create software solutions that meet present and future demands.
